title.narrative: Service Provider to deliver the Sub National Governance Programme

description.narrative: This activity (Service Provider to deliver the Sub National Governance Programme) is a component of Sub National Governance (SNG) - Khyber Pakhtunkhwa and Punjab reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £23,654,066. This component benefits Pakistan, and works in the following sector(s): Public finance management (PFM), Decentralisation and support to subnational government, Domestic revenue mobilisation. , with the following implementing partners: Oxford Policy Management. The start date is 22-08-2012 and the end date is 31-05-2018.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Decentralisation and support to subnational government

description.narrative: Accountability - General Public Service - Accountability - debt and aid management
Other General Services - General Public Service - Other General Services - Local Government Administration
Loss of Acc Stores - Arising from Other Sources
